intro: Erythrospermum acuminatissimum, commonly known as the slender red-flowered hibiscus, is a flowering plant native to Australia. The plant has heart-shaped leaves and produces capsule fruits containing numerous small seeds. It thrives in coastal areas and is often found in sandy soils.
